title.narrative: Increased capacity of government to provide quality education

description.narrative: National committee established for coordination of integrated Qur'anic education (IQE) which will be replicated at the state level. Capacity development training conducted for 4,946 primary teachers/IQE facilitators. 75 per cent of teachers present in primary and integrated Qur'anic school on day of monitoring visit, five per cent increase from 2016. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2017
